Wish i had me one of those, this RS 12-150 works well on the FM but, very l=
ittle comes in on AM, not enough stations around here I guess, I put an ant=
e on it too.=C2=A0 The Peanut gallery are still crossing into the light to =
be with (You know who) one at a time, and they are saying the line going is=
 still huge. sf
 

 



-----Original Message-----
From: Frank Sumption &lt=
;purplealiengirl@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com; RTSC@yahoogroup=
s.com
Sent: Wed, Sep 15, 2010 2:19 am
Subject: [RTSC] RF amp from AM [6 Att=
achments]

          =C2=A0                                            [Att=
achment(s) from Frank Sumption included below]                       
=C2=
=A0Trying to get improvement for weak signal areas. I added a simple single=
 stage FET antenna amplifier to the AM rod antenna by adding and extra loop=
 on the end of the rod. It's specially designed to reject all MP3 signals a=
t the antenna :-0
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S
 
      
                 
   
      =
 
  


----------MB_8CD2306523D4983_1388_A5BD_webmail-m087.sysops.aol.com

<div> Trying to get improvement for weak signa=
l areas. I added a simple single stage FET antenna amplifier to the AM rod =
antenna by adding and extra loop on the end of the rod. It's specially desi=
gned to reject all MP3 signals at the antenna :-0</div>
